transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Ji main baat fairdeal mein ho rahi hai fairdeal power electric mein.
Customer: Ji boliye.
Executive: Ji sir abhi aap logon ne ek concern raise kiya tha ki aap log apna account login nahi kar rahe hain but uske against mein but aapka lead consume ho gaya hai. Mumtaji naam se koi.
Customer: Correct correct correct. To sir.
Executive: To sir main jaan sakta hu aapne kiya hai ye cheez ko?
Customer: Nahi na wohi toh samajh nahi aa raha kyunki dekho OTP kaun se kaun se number pe jaata hai login ke liye mujhe woh pata karna hai sabse pehle. Login ka login ka jo aapka yahi wala jis number se kiya hai na aapko isi number pe OTP jayega sir.
Customer: Barobar hai.
Executive: Ji. Bilkul sir aap aise bata raha hai ki lead consume ho chuki hai woh time pe toh koi OTP mujhe aaya hi nahi aur na maine kisi ko share kiya hai.
Executive: Sir OTP nahi aayega na aapko agar kisi device mein login hai already, theek hai? Jaise maan lijiye aapne apne mobile mein login karke rakha hai. Kisi aur laptop pe ek baar login hai aur kisi ek dusre mobile pe login hai maan lijiye. To jiske paas bhi access hai woh purchase kar sakta hai. Agar aapko koi doubt ho raha hai toh aap ek kaam kariye apne profile pe jaaiye sir. Waha pe aapko aayega logout from all devices karne ke liye. Aap logout from all devices kar dijiye toh usse kya ho jayega ki jitne bhi alag alag device pe aap account login hai waha se hat jayega. Uske baad aapko yeh pata rahega ki aapne kis kis device pe login kiya hai toh aapko pata rahega ki kaun use kar raha hai kaun nahi kar raha hai. Aap yeh process kar lijiye sabse pehle.
Customer: Woh toh theek hai sir, login kar lo. Mujhe samjhaiye kaha karna hai main abhi kar deta hu.
Executive: Bilkul bilkul sir. Aap mobile pe hai ya laptop pe hai? Kaise hai sir mujhe bataiye sir.
Customer: Laptop pe.
Executive: Laptop pe. Theek hai sir aap seller.indiamart.com likhiye.
Customer: Okay. Maine signing karna hai right?
Executive: Haan sir aapko number dalna rahega. Phone number dalna rahega apna ye wala ispe aapko OTP aayegi aap login ho jayenge.
Customer: Okay.
Customer: Ab maine kaha jaana hai settings mein?
Executive: Nahi sir settings pe nahi profile pe aap jaaiye aapko right hand side mein high gaurav karke dikha raha hoga chota sa high gaurav. Right hand side top pe sir blue rang ki. Waha pe sir aapko logout ka option aa raha hoga. Logout pe click kariye sir aapko logout from all devices ka option aa raha hai waha pe?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: To logout from all devices kar dijiye sir.
Customer: Ek second. Ab isse kya dijiye mujhe.
Customer: Theek hai abhi logout from all devices maine kar diya hai isme.
Executive: Kar diya sir. To ab isse kya ho gaya ki aap apne is device se bhi abhi logout ho gaye hain. Iske alawa parallelly agar aapke paas kisi bhi device pe logged in tha aapka profile toh un sab se woh logout ho jayega. Ab par mujhe check karna tha ki main yeh check bhi kar sakta hu kaha kaha login tha?
Executive: Sir kaha ka login tha woh check kar paana. Hmm. Ek minute ruko sir main try karta hu. Mere paas access nahi hoga but let me let me let me check one second. Maine bhar bhi di thi unse baat ho raha. Maine logout kar diya from all devices. Mamta hai. To sir aap kaun hai sir?
Customer: Gaurav. Sir aapka naam kya hoga sir? Gaurav sir hai na? Gaurav. Finally Mamta isse koi. Haan haan ji aapka hi naam dala hua hai. Team member hai rate member hai haan. To main baat kar raha hu owner se owner se baat kar raha hu. Main karwa dunga unko karwa dunga.
Executive: Ji sir. Ek minute sir ruk jaaiye. Aisa hona nahi. Aap waha pe aap bhi sir kaam karte hai waha pe right?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Hello. Ji ji ji.
Customer: Hello. Ji divan divan. Haan ji haan ji sir.
Executive: To sir yeh maine bata diya na aap ab isse aage aapka koi bhi misuse nahi kar payega company ka theek hai?
Customer: Ji woh toh theek hai lekin agar mujhe pata karna hai ki yeh kisne access kiya tha uske bare mein pata kaise chalega?
Executive: Sir yeh toh kaise pata chalega yeh toh yeh ekdam IQ wala kaam ho gaya ki hum study karke bataiye na mujhe kaun tha kisne kiya hai na. Hmm. Thoda sa homework karke thoda sa homework karke bataiye na mujhe kya exactly reason hai woh kaha se access ho raha hai. Kyunki jis working hours mein woh access ho raha hai na woh hamare working hours hai hi nahi hai hamare working hours 10:30 ke baad hi chalu hote hai aur hamesha 10 baje ke pehle login ho raha hai woh.
Executive: Main samajh gaya sir aapko nahi hoga is baat ki main guarantee de raha hu. Aath ke baad mein theek hai aapki baat kare baat alag hai lekin jo existing lead thi woh toh chali gayi koi dikkat nahi hai jo chala gaya woh chala gaya. Thank you thank you sir lekin woh pata karna ek baat pata yeh karna hai ki check woh gaya kaha hai na? That is the bloody point. Theek hai sir main ek baar try karta hu apne thoda sa workout karke mujhe bataiye.
Executive: Done. Apart from that aur business kaisa chal raha hai sir yeh bataiye mujhe matlab. Nahi everything is good everything is good.
Executive: Everything is going sir business good. Theek hai. What about feedback about by lead and enquiry sir? Matlab us pe aapka conversion ho raha hai. Sir feedback kya hai sir aapka enquiry ka? My team my team will give you feedback regarding to that okay.
Executive: So whom should I connect sir let me know matlab ki services ke bare mein bhi ek baar hum kar lenge Mamta Mam. Mamta ji se baat karni hogi. Theek hai ji baat kar lenge.
Customer: You can talk with them. Done. Thank you thank you so much. Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's leads are being consumed without logging in.

- Wants to know who accessed the account.

- Wants to know the reason for lead consumption.



Resolution:

- Executive suggested logging out from all devices.

- Executive checked for access but didn't have it.

- Executive assured no further misuse.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will try to find out the reason.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, login, logout, devices, access
